preferences.name: urlbarMode
preferences.title: Url-bar behaviour.
preferences.description: Behaviour of the url-bar when focused or not. Fixed: Fixed size, Sliding: Grows when focused, Flexible: Uses space not claimed by tabs

preferences.name: urlbarBlur
preferences.title: Url-bar width, blurred
preferences.description: The width of the url-bar in pixels when it is not focused. Does not apply in Flexible mode.

preferences.name: urlbarFocused
preferences.title: Url-bar width, focused
preferences.description: The width of the url-bar in pixels when it is focused, i.e: when you are entering an address. Only applies in Sliding mode.

preferences.name: retractIdentityLabel
preferences.title: Retract identity label?
preferences.description: Whether or not to retract/slide back the identify label (for example the green label you see on secure connections).
